channel.title: Client Crashing!? Help!
channel.description:
hey guys, i made my own server nd everything was going good until, i tried logging in with the client. I can log into the server with the client just fine, but its when i start to move, thats when the client just crashes.
This is what is says in Command prompt when the client crashes: [code]Read Error: ./cache//Files/interface/clanchat/button 217.png Read Error: ./cache/Files/interface/custom 29.png Read Error: ./cache/Files/interface/custom 30.png Read Error: ./cache/Files/interface/welcome 1.png Read Error: ./cache/Files/interface/welcome 2.png # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841e06, pid=1080, t id=5868 # # JRE version: 6.0_17-b04 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51e06][/code]
Help is appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: Client Crashing!? Help!
item.dc:creator: @baller50 baller50
item.description:
@baller50 wrote:

what do you mean by the pictures? I told my friend to try logging into the server with the same client, and he moved around, and nothing happened.

But when i run the server, and log into it everything is fine. Its just when i start to move, thats when it crashes…

Do you think i couldnt be able to run a server and log into from the same client?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Crashing!? Help!
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

Did you check those pictures in the cache? That seems like it might be giving you a fatal error

Read full topic

item.title: Client Crashing!? Help!

item.description:
@baller50 wrote:

hey guys, i made my own server nd everything was going good until, i tried logging in with the client. I can log into the server with the client just fine, but its when i start to move, thats when the client just crashes.

This is what is says in Command prompt when the client crashes:

[code]Read Error: ./cache//Files/interface/clanchat/button 217.png
Read Error: ./cache/Files/interface/custom 29.png

id=5868

)
